channel.title: Spider Wands!
channel.description: In F2P, a lot of people are trying to sell them. They are crap, but easy to get and expensive. Thoughts?

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Fuck I lost 450k off these son of a bitches…
I saw ‘doubling 450k one trade’ traded kid offered 900k worth of wands… accepted it…

Read full topic

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

If you wanted to use abilities logically to me you’d use the wands to build up your bar then switch to your staff at threshold/ultimates stage. I dunno tho… I haven’t played eoc since the start of the beta and even then I never really maged in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

rip4d:

The damage tends to equal out, but its really not worth using abilities with wands, only momentum. Otherwise, I’ll stick to my Armadyl battlestaff :s

With the low cost of ice blitz why would you even want to use abilities? Besides stunning or an ultimate stick with that fast cast

Read full topic

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

The damage tends to equal out, but its really not worth using abilities with wands, only momentum. Otherwise, I’ll stick to my Armadyl battlestaff :s

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:21, topic:469776”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=587073.msg4168578#msg4168578 date=1353982078]

Does the staff of arma still effect the casting speed?

Ahrim’s wand + book does though 1.2second barrages ftw. The Ankh provides a hidden speed increase and gives better accuracy than a virtus book (And Ahrim’s book).

Sadly it is going to take a while for wand prices to normalize, I have a feeling Ahrim’s wand will settle around 25m (was 34m street the other day)
[/quote]Just got Ankh. Its freaking awesome Only downside to using that (or any other book/orb) is that spells only do 75% damage.[/quote]
But you can cast faster than any staff, making up for it

Read full topic

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:15, topic:469776”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=587073.msg4167364#msg4167364 date=1353862650]

Jagex should release monthly statements on the current economy situation and where wealth is and what it is in.

I’m sure there’s 3rd party sites that do that anyway.

It’d be nice to have an official representation.

Yeah but they’re better than nothing :>
[/quote]
can you link me to one? i’ve never seen one and Google isn’t seem to help right now.[/quote]
http://thegrandexchange.com/Home/Default.aspx

item.title: Spider Wands!
item.dc:creator: @Oliver_Sykes Oliver Sykes
item.description:
@Oliver_Sykes wrote:

Yea i bought 90 spider wands for 450k…

90 spider wands = 1M… I am still trying to sell them in the G.E even for 500k… Wondering if I should keep or not now.

Yes they are very hard to get rid of.

Read full topic
